author: ghiliweld
content:
re: HEAD verb. I didn't find aything like that, but looking at the routes, I think you can use `checkpointz/v1/beacon/slots` and taking the first slot in the response to be the current served checkpoint. <@421011679963381761> 

source: https://github.com/ethpandaops/checkpointz/blob/9c4823c6c5d60c3fe82dda27ee83019685125d4f/pkg/api/handler.go#L71

author: ghiliweld
content: please lmk if anyone knows a simpler way of doing this

author: kboom_ro
content: Yes, that's the way I ran it I think.
